ps1.8:1.4_0: Anicce, bhikkhave, niccanti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso.
ps1.8:1.5_0: Dukkhe, bhikkhave, sukhanti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso.
ps1.8:1.6_0: Anattani, bhikkhave, attāti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso.
ps1.8:1.7_0: Asubhe, bhikkhave, subhanti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso.
ps1.8:1.8_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro saññāvipallāsā cittavipallāsā diṭṭhivipallāsā.
ps1.8:2.3_0: Anicce, bhikkhave, aniccanti nasaññāvipallāso nacittavipallāso nadiṭṭhivipallāso.
ps1.8:2.4_0: Dukkhe, bhikkhave, dukkhanti nasaññāvipallāso nacittavipallāso nadiṭṭhivipallāso.
ps1.8:2.5_0: Anattani, bhikkhave, anattāti nasaññāvipallāso nacittavipallāso nadiṭṭhivipallāso.
ps1.8:2.6_0: Asubhe, bhikkhave, asubhanti nasaññāvipallāso nacittavipallāso nadiṭṭhivipallāso.
ps1.8:2.7_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro nasaññāvipallāsā nacittavipallāsā nadiṭṭhivipallāsā”ti.
ps1.8:8.1_0: Ime cattāro vipallāsā diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā, appahīnāti.
ps1.8:8.3_0: Anicce niccanti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso pahīno.
ps1.8:8.4_0: Dukkhe sukhanti saññā uppajjati, cittaṁ uppajjati, diṭṭhivipallāso pahīno.
ps1.8:8.5_0: Anattani attāti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso pahīno.
ps1.8:8.6_0: Asubhe subhanti saññā uppajjati, cittaṁ uppajjati, diṭṭhivipallāso pahīno.
ps1.8:8.8_0: Dvīsu vatthūsu dve vipallāsā pahīnā, cattāro vipallāsā appahīnā.
ps1.8:8.9_0: Catūsu vatthūsu aṭṭha vipallāsā pahīnā, cattāro vipallāsā appahīnāti.
